name: Saga Monal
fullDescription:
MV "Saga Monal" --------------- CallSign: VRZQ9 Ex-Name(s) : Hoegh Monal Saga Challenger Type : Supramax Sub type : Bulker Open Hatch Gears : 2x40T Gantry Cranes
The new vessel is the double hull type and uses the bow thruster and Becker rudder for efficient ship maneuverability during berthing and unberthing. The hatch openings have the same dimensions (length x width) as the cargo holds. Open hatch cargo holds allow efficient cargo handling of unitized cargoes of lumber, wooden chips, and paper rolls. The ship is equipped with two self-traveling gantry cranes with weather protection on the upper deck, and the wheelhouse is arranged to allow one-man bridge operation. The ship is also provided with free-fall lifeboats.
